name: getrandomjs
description: function that simplifies the way javascript uses random. Will return random number in a range, element from array, value from object, element in a string, or any number from 0 to 100. Function accepts up to 2 arguments. If nothing is passed in, it will return a random integer from 0 to 100. If two integer arguments are passed in, it will return a random number from that range. If a data type is passed in, it will parse and return a random value from that data type
author: Anthony Bronca
